description.value: Escaping your nets is no simple task. The Athletics DC to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Force Open] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Escape] your nets increases from 16 to 18. After a creature you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Grabbed] with a net Escapes or Forces Open the net, stray strands of the net cling to the creature, causing them to remain @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] until the beginning of their next turn.
